body.name: 2024 Newest Mini Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth 12000L, ZDK 1080P Full HD Outdoor Movie Portable Wifi Projector 4K, Proyector for iphone home Compatible with iOS Android TV Stick PC HDMI USB AV
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 9 mins
features: 【Fast Stable 5G WiFi Bluetooth Projector】 Built-in 2.4G+5G Dual-band Wifi, zdk projector with wifi and bluetooth achieves a wider range, faster speed, smoother transmission than other only 2.4G band projectors in the market, which can easily connected with your phone to sync phone screen. Thanks to newest bluetooth chip, it allows connect the wall bedroom indoor projector with various bluetooth speakers/headphones more stably, just enjoy the high quality sound.

【2024 Newest Native 1080P, 12000LM Projector】 ZDK mini projector equipped with high-refraction 6 layers glassed lens, provides more complex color detail image with native 1920x1080P resolution, remarkable 12000L brightness and dynamic contrast ratio of 20000:1. This movie projector for iphone laptop android ipad creating a cinematic feel and bringing your content to life.

【Long Bulb Light & Shocking HIFI Speaker Projector】 Compact yet powerful, ZDK Smart Outdoor Projector offers advanced features in a sleek design. The advanced cooling fan and energy-saving LED light source not only ensure a longer projector lifespan but also deliver an incredible audio-visual experience. Ideal for gift, travel, camping, home theaters, bedrooms, gaming rooms, backyard gatherings, and beach nights.

【200" Massive Display with Zoom Function】 Equipped with massive 200-inch screen, zdk roku gaming video projector bring movies to life in the comfort of your own home. Take control of your remote control with the zoom function, allowing you to adjust the image size seamlessly from 100% to 50%, which adapt to various spaces and preferences, transform your living space into a personal theater with our tv projector with wifi and bluetooth. Enjoy the convenience of intelligent adjustments in 4k projector that exceeds expectations.

【Wide Compatible Proyector & Worryless Support】 As a multi-function home projector 1080p, it equipped with HDMI,USB,3.5mm headphone interfaces already included, which can be easily connected with TV Stick, iphone, Android phone, USB Flash Disk, tablet, laptop, PC, PS5, Gaming Consoles, etc.（Please Note: Due to copyright protections, you need to use HDMI-cable to connect your laptop for screen mirroring like Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu and some similar apps. HDMI adapter and TV Stick not included.） Please rest assured that we also have 2-year warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Should by if you love family entertainment
reviews.reviewText: The ZDK Mini Projector exceeded my expectations! The 5G WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity make it versatile, while the 9500 lumens deliver vivid visuals. Native 1080P FHD resolution ensures sharp image quality, and the 200" projection size is perfect for home entertainment. Seamless compatibility with iOS, Android, and more makes it a top choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Projector with nice screen clarity
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The projector display was clear and crisp while being easy to setup. It did not have issues while connecting via screen casting through a mobile phone. I had used the HDMI port and the screen mirroring did not have any lag issues. The package comes with along with HDMI and RCA cables for audio. Box came in a nice little package. The screen focus adjustment can be a minor hassle but nothing that interferes with convenient usage. Seems decent for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These screen protectors are nice. My daughter has a Switch which she adores. She likes to play it after her homework is done. She worked hard and saved her money up to get the device. I wanted to make sure that her investment would last. She is careful but drops and tumbles happen. My biggest concern is that a tumble would result in a cracked screen. These screen protectors have a couple of things that I like. They look and feel well made. I am not concerned that they would fail to protect my daughter's device. The screen protectors came with a guide which was super helpful. The screen protectors are a nice addition to my daughter's Switch. The help protect her device's screen and don't negatively affect its performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice video projector. It looks and feels like it is well made and durable. We use it to watch movies outside at night. It projects clear and sharp images that are colorful. The projector is easy to set up and use. It is just as easy to take down and bring inside when the movie is over. A nice option for outdoor movies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product is well packaged. The use effect is satisfactory. Despite its small size, its performance is powerful. Setup was a breeze and within minutes I was ready to enjoy a movie experience in my living room. Images are sharp and colorful, providing a viewing experience that rivals larger, more expensive projectors. Its portability is a significant plus; whether I'm having a movie night in the backyard or giving a business presentation on the go, this projector hasn't let me down so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was initially skeptical about its performance, but I was proven wrong. Setup was easy and our little home theater was up and running in no time. The image quality is clearly visible even when projected on larger surfaces. The built-in speakers, while not very powerful, are enough for a comfortable movie experience. It's portable and lightweight, which means we can even take it with us on camping trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have a room in our home that doesn't have any windows. We have made this room a home theater with this projector as its centerpiece. This projector is well made and durable. It was easy to get in place in our home theater and set to the perfect size for viewing. The images it produces are clear and well defined. My kids love the home theater and watching movies as a family. A solid option for an in-home family theater.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The colors are very bright.
reviews.reviewText: This projector is indeed a powerful product. The images projected in a small bedroom are not only clear, but the colors are also very bright. It is a portable model and the size is very suitable. I no longer have to worry about where to watch movies. It has an intelligent operation interface. , it’s not too convenient at all. I stayed up late and watched a movie the night it arrived. It was an absolutely comfortable shopping trip! There is no lag when connecting to the mobile phone, everything runs very fast, and it is so convenient to use.
